title: Gottlieb - All Ball - Doug's post-NBA season wrap up and NBA Draft preview with analyst Jonathan Givony
itunes:title: Gottlieb - All Ball - Doug's post-NBA season wrap up and NBA Draft preview with analyst Jonathan Givony
description:
Subscribe here to the All Ball with Doug Gottlieb Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/all-ball-with-doug-gottlieb/id1358843497?mt=2

This week, Gottlieb puts a bow on the NBA season by explaining why he thinks Kevin Durant can return to close to 100% after his Achilles injury, what's next for the Warriors, Rockets and Lakers after acquiring Anthony Davis. In-depth NBA Draft discussion with Jonathan Givony from Draft Express. Download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts:

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
